metadata.dc:author: Rodríguez, Almudena Calvache
Cao, Raquel Barranco
Cuadrado, Jaime Fernández
Artero, Sonia Morales
Fernández, Florentino Perea
Llodra, Guillermo Payeras
Pavón, Camilo J Castellón
metadata.dc:description: Myelolipoma is a very uncommon tumor and is extremely rare in the liver. Patients are usually asymptomatic and preoperative diagnosis is often difficult. We report a new case of hepatic myelolipoma and review all the cases previously reported in the literature. Clinicopathologic and radiologic findings, as well as therapeutic options, are discussed.
metadata.dc:title: Mielolipoma hepático: diagnóstico y tratamiento.
[Hepatic myelolipoma. Diagnosis and treatment].
